alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Ford; Kiowa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:52PM CDT until June 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ford County in southwestern Kansas... Northern Kiowa County in south central Kansas... Southern Edwards County in south central Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 552 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bellefont to near Ford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bellefont around 600 PM CDT. Offerle around 605 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kinsley and Lewis. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
